# GitHub Workflows

## Purpose

CI/CD workflows for automated testing, building, and deployment.

## Workflows

### CI (`ci.yml`)

Continuous integration workflow that:
- Runs tests on commits
- Checks code quality
- Validates builds
- Reports results

## Integration

- Triggers on push and pull requests
- Runs test suites
- Validates code quality
- Provides build status

## Documentation

See `ci.yml` for workflow configuration details.
